title: Delivery Information
content: All digital products are delivered within 1-24 hours after payment confirmation. Most orders are processed within 1-2 hours during business hours.

title: Payment Verification
content: Please ensure you send the exact amount shown in your selected currency. Screenshots of payment confirmation may be required for verification purposes.

title: Account Usage Policy
content: Purchased accounts are for personal use only. Sharing credentials or reselling accounts is strictly prohibited and may result in account termination.

title: Customer Support
content: Our support team is available 24/7 via Telegram. For urgent issues, please contact us immediately after purchase with your receipt ID.

title: Refund Policy
content: Refunds are available within 24 hours of purchase if the product is not delivered or does not work as described. Digital products cannot be returned once delivered.
